Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bedspread \Bed"spread`\, n. A bedquilt; a counterpane; a coverlet. [U. S.] [1913 Webster]
bedspread n : decorative cover for a bed [syn: {bedcover}, {bed cover}, {bed covering}, {counterpane}, {spread}]
